Package com.tenio.common.utility

Class ByteUtility

java.lang.Object
com.tenio.common.utility.ByteUtility
public final class ByteUtility extends Object
This class provides utility methods to work with stream of bytes.

      public static byte[] resizeBytesArray(byte[] source, int position, int newSize)
      Resizes the current array of bytes, create a new one.
      Parameters:
      source - the array of binary source
      position - the position in where the new array will start
      newSize - the new array's size
